Name: Quick Jab
Description: Deal 2 damage + 2 damage per unique debuff type on enemy

Name: Galvanize
Description: Deal 3 damage. Heal each protagonist by 1

Name: Bulwark
Description: Deal 5 damage. Reduce the cost of Defense cards in hand by 1

Name: Cooperative Strike
Description: Deal 8 damage. Attack cards in hand from the other protagonist gain +4 attack

Name: Protective Stance
Description: Gain Taunt equal to Ovation. Gain Shield equal to Ovation

Name: Protect
Description: Gain 2 Block and 2 Shield to target protagonist

Name: True Strike
Description: Target protagonist gains 2 Piercing and 2 Focus
Notes: change ability name from Accuracy to Focus

Name: Cleanse
Description: Gain 5 Block. Remove all Burn and Poison from target

Name: Captivating Strike
Description: Deal 2 damage. Gain 1 Ovation per damage dealt to target

Name: Create Opportunity
Description: Deal 3 damage. Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1

Name: Annoying Poke
Description: Deal 1 damage. Inflict 1 Frustration. Gain 1 Distract

Name: Stylish Dance
Description: Lose all Ovation. Inflict Stage Fright

Name: Vex
Description: Gain 2 Taunt. Inflict 2 Frustration and 1 Forgetful

Name: Ultimate Jeer
Description: Deal [Ovation] damage. Gain [Ovation] Taunt. Inflict [Ovation] Frustration
